i1.blurb: After casting 3 spells, Sona's next attack deals bonus magic damage in addition to a bonus effect depending on what song Sona last activated.
description: {{sbc|Aura:}} '''Sona's''' basic [[Champion ability|abilities]] each generate a unique [[aura]] for 3 seconds that empowers her and all allied [[champion]]s who enter its radius, also incurring a {{fd|0.5}} seconds period during which she cannot cast her other basic abilities.

{{sbc|Power Chord:}} After casting 3 basic abilities, '''Sona's''' next [[basic attack]] deals {{pp|20;30;40;50;60;70;80;90;105 to 240|formula=10+10 at each level up to 8 and+15 up to 18}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}, with an additional effect depending on the last basic ability cast.
i1.name: Power Chord
notes: * When ''Power Chord'' is ready, Sona gains a ring around her. This ring will have a different color depending on the last ability used (''{{ai|Hymn of Valor|Sona|blue}}, {{ai|Aria of Perseverance|Sona|green}} or {{ai|Song of Celerity|Sona|purple}}'').
** The effect does not change if abilities are used while the projectile is in motion.
* The triggering attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.

w1.blurb: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sona''' {{tip|heals}} herself and the most wounded nearby allied champion.
{{sbc|Aura:}} '''Sona''' and tagged allied champions receive a {{tip|shield}} lasting up to {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
{{sbc|{{ai|Power Chord|Sona}} â€“ Diminuendo:}} ''Power Chord'' reduces its target's size and damage output by 25% {{as|(+ 4% per 100 AP)}} for 3 seconds.
w1.name: Aria of Perseverance
notes: * If no one is injured ''Aria of Perseverance'' will target the closest allied champion.

r1.blurb: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them. Each rank reduces the base cooldown of Sona's basic abilities.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a {{fd|0.2}}-second delay, '''Sona''' plays an irresistible chord in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemy champions struck and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
r1.name: Crescendo
notes: * Enemies {{tip|stun|stunned}} by ''Crescendo'' are made to dance 50% faster for its duration.
